FuncDef:
The esqm service-stream command configures a packet sampling direction for ESQM globally.
The undo esqm service-stream command restores the default configuration.
By default, no packet sampling direction is configured for ESQM.
CLIs: undo esqm service-stream { inbound | outbound } [ vpn-instance <vpn-instance-name> ]

ParaDef.Info:
Configures the sampling direction of ESQM to be inbound.
-

Configures the sampling direction of ESQM to be outbound.
-

Specifies the VPN instance name.
The value is a string of 1 to 31 case-sensitive characters, spaces not supported. When double quotation marks are used around the string, spaces are allowed in the string.

ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
After ESQM is enabled globally, you must configure a packet sampling direction before starting ESQM. To configure a packet sampling direction for ESQM globally, run the esqm service-stream command in the ESQM view.
If vpn-instance vpn-instance-name is specified, ESQM is performed for inbound or outbound packets on all the interfaces to which the specified VPN instance is bound.If vpn-instance vpn-instance-name is not specified, ESQM is performed for inbound or outbound packets on all the interfaces to which no VPN instance is bound.
